fields.description:
To reproduce:
1. Install and run KS> Controls> Picker> Picker custom images

Actual result:
Crash
{code}
Jun 28 13:07:58 Europa backboardd[28] <Warning>: Application 'UIKitApplication:com.appcelerator.kitchensink[0xdaa9]' exited abnormally with signal 6: Abort trap: 6
Jun 28 13:07:58 Europa ReportCrash[378] <Error>: libMobileGestalt MobileGestalt.c:240: string Carrier is not a valid gestalt question
Jun 28 13:07:58 Europa ReportCrash[378] <Notice>: Saved crashreport to /var/mobile/Library/Logs/CrashReporter/KitchenSink_2013-06-28-130758_Europa.plist using uid: 0 gid: 0, synthetic_euid: 501 egid: 0
{code}
fields.summary: iOS7: Picker - Picker custom images - crash on launch
